description:
An update for "Code Name: S.T.E.A.M." is now available from Nintendo eShop.

All customers who own a copy of “Code Name: S.T.E.A.M.” should download the update.

This will update the software to Version 1.2.0 with the following amendments:

- Various bugs have been fixed in order to provide a smoother gaming experience.
name:

Update
